tabGroups.input_query: Enter and search tab group or tab

options.title: Extension options
options.removeSavedTabGroupWhenRestore: Delete saved tab groups on restore
options.reloadOnHighlight: Reload tab when a tab group highlighting
options.overwriteTabGroup: Overwrites a tab group with the same name if it has been saved
options.openInNewWindow: Open in a new window when restoring a saved tab group
options.showUnGroupedTabs: Display tabs not included in tab groups
